header.type: HUMAN RIGHTS VIOLATIONS, SUBMISSIONS QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS

testimony: Is there something you would like to say otherwise you can just confirm what has happened.

I would be redundant.   There was no stone that was left unturned.   I just want to thank....
 I was wondering what I was going to say here because everything has been said, even what I thought I would say.
 Thank you.

Thank you Sir.
 I will remember what you said even when I am back home.  I will use the terms that you used today, when one is being redundant, I will remember your terms exactly.
